## ==A construction worker redesigns education, MinutePhysics makes science simple, and why the public vs. private school war is finally ending.==

==_If you enjoy this edition, forward this email to a friend! First time reading? Subscribe and learn more at_== [==_OpenEd.co_==](http://opened.co/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=101-when-builders-become-architects)==___._==

### ==üí° THOUGHT==

## ==**Public vs. Private? How about BOTH?**==

==The Public vs. Private school war is over==

==The winners? Everyone who stopped choosing sides.==

==In Utah, a homeschooled kid takes robotics at the local high school. In Florida, a private school student joins the public school band. In Arizona, a public school offers √† la carte classes to anyone with an Empowerment Scholarship Account.==

==It‚Äôs not about choosing public OR private anymore. It's about choosing what works for YOUR child.==

==The future of education isn't about walls - it's about bridges.==

[https://platform.twitter.com/embed/Tweet.html?dnt=false&embedId=twitter-widget-0&%3D%3D&frame=false&hideCard=false&hideThread=false&id=1861394476033335417&lang=en&origin=https%3A%2F%2Fopened-daily.beehiiv.com%2Fp%2Fnew-post-34bd&sessionId=89a1b6575808c599f87bb3c3fe24a36bf428f010&theme=light&widgetsVersion=2615f7e52b7e0%3A1702314776716&width=550px](https://platform.twitter.com/embed/Tweet.html?dnt=false&embedId=twitter-widget-0&%3D%3D&frame=false&hideCard=false&hideThread=false&id=1861394476033335417&lang=en&origin=https%3A%2F%2Fopened-daily.beehiiv.com%2Fp%2Fnew-post-34bd&sessionId=89a1b6575808c599f87bb3c3fe24a36bf428f010&theme=light&widgetsVersion=2615f7e52b7e0%3A1702314776716&width=550px)

### ==üìä TREND==

## ==**From Builder to Architect: Dads Redesigning Education**==

==Brooks Sullards, a construction industry veteran and father of eight, recently shared how dads are finding new ways to engage in their children's education. In== [==a thoughtful piece for Classical Conversations==](https://classicalconversations.com/blog/homeschooling-from-a-dad-to-a-dad/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=101-when-builders-become-architects)==, he describes his journey from being hands-off to becoming an active architect of his kids' learning.==

=="It's easier for me not to be involved," Sullards admits. "It is easier for me to simply 'bring home the bacon' and leave the homeschooling to my beautiful wife."==

==But like many fathers, he's discovered something more valuable than easy ‚Äì the power of intentional design. The new education architects are:==

- ==Breaking down complex subjects into manageable pieces==
- ==Mapping learning paths based on each child's wiring==
- ==Creating space for failure and iteration==

[==**Read Sullards' full article at Classical Conversations ‚Üí**==](https://classicalconversations.com/blog/homeschooling-from-a-dad-to-a-dad/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=101-when-builders-become-architects)

### ==üõ†Ô∏è TOOL==

## ==**Physics in a Minute (or Three)**==

==Need to explain why the solar system is flat to your curious 10-year-old? (Or maybe you're the one wondering‚Ä¶)==

==Enter the== [==MinutePhysics==](https://www.youtube.com/@MinutePhysics?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=101-when-builders-become-architects) ==YouTube channel: Where complex science meets simple stick figures.==

==Created by Henry Reich, these bite-sized videos have racked up over 500 million views explaining everything from quantum mechanics to why stars are star-shaped. Reich‚Äôs secret is breaking down mind-bending concepts into digestible pieces using nothing fancier than marker drawings (okay, and occasionally some killer visual effects).==

==**Best picks to start:**==

[==Is it Better to Walk or Run in the Rain?==](https://youtu.be/3MqYE2UuN24?si=38tdliz4m07b1rfA&utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=101-when-builders-become-architects) ==(20M views)====  
==[==Why is the Solar System Flat?==](https://youtu.be/tmNXKqeUtJM?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=101-when-builders-become-architects) ==(9M views)====  
==[==Time Travel in Fiction Rundown==](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d3zTfXvYZ9s&utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=101-when-builders-become-architects) ==(11M views)==

==The drawings might be simple, but the insights are profound.==

[==Check out MinutePhysics on YouTube ‚Üí==](https://www.youtube.com/@MinutePhysics?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=101-when-builders-become-architects)
